string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon storybook
I'm sure I received the storybook from #p2071008# after helping him out. Where did it go? Should I go see Haetnim again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031270##k for him. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I helped Haetnim out, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with Haetnim, he promised to give me the storybook if I buy #b5 #t2020001#s#k for his hungry sister.\n\n#t2020001# #b#c2020001##k / 5
I gave Haetnim 5 #t2020001#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031270#.
아 절 도와주셨던 분이군요. 이제 곳 밤이 되면 호랑이가 내려올텐데 당신도 안전하게 피하는 것이 좋을거에요. 그런데 무슨 일로 다시 오셨나요? 하실 말씀이라도 있으신가요?
제가 드린 동화책을 잃어버리셨다구요? 어쩌다가 잃어버리셨어요. 다행히도 저한테 한권이 더 있답니다. 제 부탁을 들어주시면 동화책을 드릴게요. 동생이 너무 배고파해서요. 동생에게 줄 #b#t2020001# 5개#k만 사와주세요. 그런데 어쩌죠...저한테는 돈이 없는데...

Ah, you're the one that helped me before. It's going to be dark soon, and tigers will be roaming around the streets, so I suggest you hide in a safe place. By the way, how can I help you? Is there anything you want to tell me...?

Did you lose the storybook that I gave you? How did you lose it? Thankfully, I have an extra copy with me, but I'd like for you to do me a favor before I hand you the other copy. My brother seems to be really hungry right now, so if you can get me #b5 #t2020001#s#k for him, then I'll promise to give you the storybook. Oh no! I'm so sorry, but I don't have money with me right now ...
Didn't you tell me you needed the storybook?
Thank you very much. My brother will surely appreciate it.
Here, please take the storybook. I need to get ready here before the tiger comes.
Oh my gosh, my brother keeps asking for some chicken!
